CustomField.description: Red: Lead being worked. Only to be contacted by owner. Yellow: No activity in last 35 days. Please consult lead owner before contacting. Green: No activity in the last 45 days. Lead free to be contacted.
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR( Days_since_last_activity__c < 35, TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Lead_Owner_Change_Timestamp__c) < 15, TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < 15, of_future_events__c>0, of_future_tasks__c>0), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"),
IF(AND(
OR( ISNULL(Days_since_last_activity__c), Days_since_last_activity__c > 45), OR( AND( ISBLANK(of_future_events__c), ISBLANK(of_future_tasks__c)), AND( of_future_events__c=0, of_future_tasks__c=0))), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"),
IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRde","Maybe")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Red: Lead being worked. Only to be contacted by owner. Yellow: No activity in last 35 days. Please consult lead owner before contacting. Green: No activity in the last 45 days. Lead free to be contacted.
CustomField.label: Lead Free to be Contacted?
